Things I Do

Project & Product Management

I have over 4 years of experience as a tech project manager, with a focus in eCommerce platforms and content management systems. I have worked in fashion, crowdfunding and event production.

Front-End Development

A front-end enthusiast, I revel in turning designs into a functional website. I enjoy working with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript or jQuery. However, I can do front-end in most environments, including Ruby and Android. I also like templating languages such as Slim and Jekyll.

Wireframing/UX

With a background in psychology and being a tech-savvy, heavy-internet-using millenial, I have an inherent sense for what constitutes good user experience, and creating clear and logical user flows feels like second nature and something that I really enjoy and feel strongly about. The bulk of my professional wireframing and user experience design was for a complex crowdfunding platform.

Photography

Photography is an art in threat of becoming trite in this age of photo-focused, filtered social media. And with everyone having a decent-quality camera in their pockets in the form of multitasking, omnipresent little devices, the thought of the terabytes of mediocre, ill-conceived photos that we accumulate as a society is anxiety-inducing. But trying to capture life, something relatable, beautiful, ugly, raw - is undeniably appealing. My little DSLR helps me capture moments mainly on my travels, although I also have many photos around New York City, where I am currently based. I'm also interested in interior photography. A site dedicated to some of my photos will be coming soon.

Voiceovers

Upon hearing my high-pitched and excitable social speaking voice, people usually do not expect that I have been a lifelong choir alto. I have a diverse speaking range, from bubbly and whimsical to sultry and hoarse, my voice can carry a multitude of emotions and personalities. Being raised in a British-run Hong Kong, and living in the US for the past couple decades, both an American and British accent come naturally to me. Available for voiceover contract work. Can produce my own high quality, edited audio files. Contact me for an audio sample.
